mapper.select: select * from suho_user order by name
mapper.insert: insert into suho_user (user_id, passwd, name, address, gender, birth) values (#{user_id}, MYPACK.ENCRYPT(#{passwd}), #{name}, #{address}, #{gender}, #{birth})
mapper.select: select count(*) from suho_user where user_id=#{user_id} and passwd=#{passwd}
